message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. It's a fair price considering its value to both of us. Let me know what you think.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $1,600,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,600,000 is still a bit lower than I'm hoping for. I'm willing to come down to $1,650,000. This is a good compromise, considering we both value this product highly. Let me know if you're interested.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm willing to consider $1,625,000 as a counteroffer. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while also being within my budget.
